SEARCH

Class FileSystem.FileSystem

java.lang.Object
FileSystem.FileSystem
public class FileSystem.FileSystem extends Object
Represents a file system with directories and files.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final FileSystem.Directory
    root
    The root directory of the file system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FileSystem.FileSystem()
    Initializes a new file system with a root directory.

    • changeDirectory

      public FileSystem.Directory changeDirectory(String path)
      Changes the current directory to the directory with the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the directory
      Returns:
      the directory with the given path, or null if the directory is not found

      public FileSystem.Directory getRoot()

    • changeDirectoryHelper

      private FileSystem.Directory changeDirectoryHelper(String path, FileSystem.Directory current)
      Helper method to change the current directory to the directory with the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the directory
      current - the current directory
      Returns:
      the directory with the given path, or null if the directory is not found

    • moveElementHelper

      private void moveElementHelper(String name, FileSystem.Directory current, FileSystem.Directory newParent)
      Helper method to move a file or directory with the given name to the new parent directory.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the file or directory
      current - the current directory
      newParent - the new parent directory

    • deleteDirectoryHelper

      private void deleteDirectoryHelper(String name, FileSystem.Directory parent, Iterator<FileSystem.FileSystemElement> iterator)
      Helper method to delete a directory with the given name from the given directory.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the directory
      parent - the parent directory
      iterator - an iterator over the children of the parent directory

    • searchHelper

      private int searchHelper(String name, FileSystem.Directory directory)
      Helper method to search for a file or directory with the given name in the file system.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the file or directory
      directory - the directory to search in
      Returns:
      the number of occurrences of the file or directory with the given name
